definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Our Stone Age ancestors certainly did not live in a feedlot.
sentences.chinese: 我們石器時代的祖先當然沒有生活在飼養場。

sentences.english: Wow- you reficisly live in the Stone Age.
sentences.chinese: 哇，你真的還生活在石器時代。

sentences.english: That time was the Stone Age.
Palaeolithic remains are identified in the fourth layer of the Southern zone.
sentences.chinese: 舊石器文化遺存主要發現在南區第4層。

sentences.english: Taizhou has a long history, the Neolithic Age to the birth of human civilization under the Tang.
sentences.chinese: 台州歷史悠久，新石器時代就誕生下湯人類文明。

sentences.english: Recent excavations have revealed two main Neolithic cultures lying in stratified sequence.
sentences.chinese: 近年的考古發掘，主要顯示兩個新石器時代的文化層。

sentences.english: Warrick used his sling to strike the magic ring worn around Terak's neck.
sentences.chinese: 用投石器擊中了泰拉克掛在脖子上的魔法戒指。

sentences.english: It was clear right away this was a gigantic Stone Age site.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯這是一個巨大的石器時代的遺蹟。

sentences.english: This stone axe is a relic of the Old Stone Age.
sentences.chinese: 這把石斧是舊石器時代的遺物。

sentences.english: And scientists believe that making stone tools helped propel that evolution.
sentences.chinese: 而科學家認爲，製造石器幫助推進這種進化。

sentences.english: We are developing a bomb-them-back-into-the-Stone-Age weapon.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在開發一種把他們炸回石器時代的武器。

sentences.english: During Neolithic Period, people have already begun breeding silkworm and producing silk.
sentences.chinese: 新石器時代，蠶的養殖和絲綢的生產，就已經開始了。

sentences.english: At that time, that has entered the stage with copper and stone, a late Neolithic Age.
sentences.chinese: 說明當時已進入銅石並用階段，屬新石器時代晚期。

sentences.english: War Galleys are larger than normal galleys. Equipped with ballista or catapults.
sentences.chinese: 加列戰艦比戰船更爲巨大，上置弩炮或投石器。

sentences.english: So how can we know anything about life in Stone Age Europe?
sentences.chinese: 所以，我們如何瞭解石器時代歐洲的人類生活呢？

definition: the Bronze Age/also written 青銅時代|青铜时代[Qing1 tong2 Shi2 dai4]
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
ancient hominid species such as Homo erectus, Neanderthal man etc
Qijia neolithic culture, centered around the Gansu Corridor 河西走廊[He2 xi1 Zou3 lang2] c. 2000 BC
